message: Let's start fair, I propose a 60/40 split. I think this is a good way to begin, what do you think?
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. I propose a 55/45 split instead. This reflects the time value of the money at stake - let's wrap this up quickly.
Let's split it evenly this time. I'm willing to compromise, and I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to go.
